original_text: “Who then is the faithful and wise servant, whom his master has set over his household, to give them their food at the proper time?
korean_text: 충성되고 지혜 있는 종이 되어 주인에게 그 집 사람들을 맡아 때를 따라 양식을 나눠 줄 자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: Who then is the faithful and wise servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 충성되고 지혜 있는 종은 누구입니까?

sentences.original_text: whom his master has set over his household
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 주인이 자기 가정을 다스리도록 세운 종

sentences.original_text: to give them their food at the proper time?
